about_the_game:
Includes the Forebearers - Hearth & Home Original Soundtrack with music by Pablo Sorribes Bernhard in MP3 and FLAC format.

TRACK LIST
01 - Forebearers (Title Theme) [3:17]
02 - Perseverance [7:33]
03 - New Lands [8:01]
04 - Hazards of Nature [6:02]
05 - Voices of Mourning [8:14]
06 - Our People [7:19]
07 - Hearth & Home [2:14]

Files will be downloaded to the Forebearers game directory "...Forebearers/Soundtrack".
